recipe.title: Stone Fruit Slaw
ingredients: 1 1/2 pound assorted firm stone fruit (about 5; such as plums, nectarines, peaches, or apricots), julienned
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Whisk first 6 ingredients in a medium bowl. Add fruit and scallions; toss gently to coat. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
